comments:
Have two programs running, one with a 1.6 vm another with a 1.4.  
Inspect a variable in the 1.4 program, creating an expression in the expressions view.
Select a stack frame in the 1.6 vm.
Select a variable in the inspect expression.
Under the run menu select All Instances...
One or more errors will occur, see below.

If possible, the action should be disabled.

eclipse.buildId=N20070423-0010
java.version=1.6.0
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86 -startup /home/cwindatt/eclipse/eclipse-SDK-I20070423/eclipse/plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.N20070423-0010.jar

Error
Tue Sep 18 11:14:04 CDT 2007
An internal error occurred during: "has children update".

	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.ReferenceTypeImpl.instances(ReferenceTypeImpl.java:1958)

I also had the Show References setting in the variables view turned on, which also results in errors with the given steps.
